events.title: Charity Run
events.description: Join us for a fun-filled day at Hampton Park to support local charities. Participants can run or walk in this community event to help raise funds for those in need.

events.title: Coding Workshop
events.description: This workshop at Durham College will teach beginners how to code with Python. Ideal for anyone looking to start their programming journey!

events.title: Beach Cleanup
events.description: Help keep our beaches beautiful! Volunteers needed for a beach cleanup along the Waterfront Trail. Supplies provided.

events.title: Food Truck Festival
events.description: Taste the best local eats on wheels! Join us at Lakeview Park for a day of great food, live music, and family fun.

events.title: Farmers' Market Opening Day
events.description: Celebrate the opening day of our local Farmers' Market. Fresh produce, homemade goods, and more available at Pickering Town Centre.

events.title: Outdoor Movie Night
events.description: Enjoy a family-friendly movie under the stars at Rotary Park. Bring a blanket and some snacks for a relaxing evening.

events.title: Music in the Park
events.description: Experience live music performances at Memorial Park with local bands and artists. Free admission, all are welcome!

events.title: Cultural Heritage Festival
events.description: Join us for a celebration of diversity and culture at the Harmony Creek Community Centre. Enjoy cultural performances, crafts, and food from around the world.

events.title: Halloween Haunt
events.description: Get ready for a spooky night in the woods at our Halloween Haunt. Scary attractions, costume contests, and candy for all ages!

events.title: Christmas Parade
events.description: Kick off the holiday season with the annual Christmas Parade in downtown Bowmanville. Floats, bands, and Santa Claus will be there!
